relation: Château Canon-la-Gaffelière Gcc St-Emilion Stefan Von Neipperg Bordeaux Saint-Emilion Rouges Français (2009) Comments: This is well-cloaked for now in roasted vanilla and espresso notes ... Best from 2015 through 2030. -JM
Château Guiraud Sémillon-Sauvignon Blanc Blend Sauternes (2009) Comments: This is a bird of a different feather, with an exotic, vibrant aroma of toasted coconut ... Best from 2015 through 2040. -JM
Pape Clement Bordeaux Blend Wine (2009) Comments: Rich and muscular, with exotic roasted spice, braised fig and warm raspberry confiture ... Best from 2015 through 2030. -JM
Château Doisy-Vedrines Barsac (2009) Comments: Richly layered and detailed, but thoroughly mouthwatering, this lets lacy citrus, floral ... Best from 2015 through 2032. -JM

C. Von Schubert Riesling Qualitatswein Trocken Mosel Maximin Grunhauser (2010) Comments: Tangy and dry, with lots of apricot tart, tarragon, grapefruit and baked apple flavors ... Best from 2014 through 2024. -KM
Schloss Vollrads Riesling Spätlese (2010) Comments: Very balanced and lively, with well-defined flavors of red peach, melon, baked apple ... Drink now through 2040. -KM
Barrel 27 Head Honcho Santa Barbara County Syrah (2008) Comments: For all its peppery, spicy dried berry allure, allied to a tight structure ... Best from 2013 through 2023. -JL
